This module implements Minima's basic key value database.

Imports

tree, log

Types

Database = ref object
  log: Log
  tree: BTree[string, seq[byte]]
  Source Edit 
DatabaseError = enum
  DirectoryCreationFailed = "minima: failed to create db directory",
  TreeFileCreationFailed = "minima: failed to create tree file",
  KeyNotFound = "minima: key not found",
  PersistenceFailed = "minima: persistence failed"
  Source Edit

Procs

proc toAESKey(str: string): array[aes256.sizeKey, byte] {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Concerts a string to an AES Key for opening an encrypted database.

Example:: .. code-block:

let password = "foo".toAESKey

  Source Edit 
proc init(T: type Database; log: Log): T:type

Init creates a Database.

Example: .. code-block:

let db = Database.init(StandardLog.init(file))

  Source Edit 
proc open(dir: string; key: array[aes256.sizeKey, byte]): Result[Database,
    DatabaseError] {...}{.raises: [IOError],
                    tags: [WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect, ReadIOEffect].}

Opens an encrypted database at the specified path.

Example:

let result = open("/tmp/minima", "password".toAESKey)
if not result.isOk:
  return
  Source Edit 
proc open(dir: string): Result[Database, DatabaseError] {...}{.raises: [IOError],
    tags: [WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect, ReadIOEffect].}

Opens a database at the specified path. This will create a new directory if it does not yet exist.

Example:

let result = open("/tmp/minima")
if not result.isOk:
  return
  Source Edit 
proc close(db: Database) {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
Closes the database.   Source Edit 
proc get(db: Database; key: seq[byte]): Result[seq[byte], DatabaseError] {...}{.raises: [],
    tags: [].}

Retrieve a value if it exists.

Example:

let key = @[byte 1, 2, 3, 4]
let value = @[byte 4, 3, 2, 1]
db.set(key, value)
assert(db.get(key) == value)
  Source Edit 
proc set(db: Database; key: seq[byte]; value: seq[byte]): Result[void, DatabaseError] {...}{.
    raises: [], tags: [].}

Set a value for a key.

Example:

let key = @[byte 1, 2, 3, 4]
let value = @[byte 4, 3, 2, 1]
db.set(key, value)
assert(db.get(key) == value)
  Source Edit 
proc has(db: Database; key: seq[byte]): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Check whether a value has been set for a key.

Example:

let key = @[byte 1, 2, 3, 4]
db.set(key, @[byte 4, 3, 2, 1]])
assert(db.has(key))
  Source Edit
